quotes.text: The only way to learn programming is by programming.
quotes.author: Dennis Ritchie

quotes.text: First, solve the problem. Then, write the code.
quotes.author: John Johnson

quotes.text: Experience is the name everyone gives to their mistakes.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.
quotes.author: Chinese Proverb

quotes.text: Code is like humor. When you have to explain it, it's bad.
quotes.author: Cory House

quotes.text: Programming is not about typing, it's about thinking.
quotes.author: Rich Hickey

quotes.text: The most damaging phrase in the language is: 'It's always been done that way.'
quotes.author: Grace Hopper

quotes.text: Simplicity is the soul of efficiency.
quotes.author: Austin Freeman

quotes.text: The best code is no code at all.
quotes.author: Jeff Atwood

quotes.text: Every great developer you know got there by solving problems they were unqualified to solve until they actually did it.
quotes.author: Patrick McKenzie

quotes.text: Don't be afraid to ask questions. The dumbest question is the one you don't ask.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: The only stupid question is the one you don't ask.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: Learning to code is learning to create and solve puzzles.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.text: A good programmer is someone who always looks both ways before crossing a one-way street.
quotes.author: Doug Linder

quotes.text: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Walt Disney

quotes.text: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quotes.author: Sam Levenson

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Confucius

quotes.text: Everything you've ever wanted is on the other side of fear.
quotes.author: George Addair

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Winston Churchill

quotes.text: The only impossible journey is the one you never begin.
quotes.author: Tony Robbins

quotes.text: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
quotes.author: Theodore Roosevelt

quotes.text: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quotes.text: Go confidently in the direction of your dreams. Live the life you have imagined.
quotes.author: Henry David Thoreau
